| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A M ( 1 S B ) ) ) = ( N ` ( A M B ) ) ) |

| 12 |  | #P_ax-1cn | |- 1 e. CC |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_ipval2lem5 | |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ 1 e. CC ) -> ( ( N ` ( A M ( 1 S B ) ) ) ^ 2 ) e. RR ) |
